.NET Tools Livestreams

Webinar – Uno Platform & Hot Design for Rider

Join us Tuesday, March 11, 2025, 15:00 – 16:30 UTC (check other timezones) for our free live webinar, Uno Platform & Hot Design for Rider, with Andres Pineda.

Register now and get a reminder, or join on YouTube

Hot Design is the industry’s first visual designer for cross-platform .NET applications. It transforms your running app into a visual designer right from Rider, and other IDEs. Maximizing developer productivity has always been the focus of the open-source Uno Platform. The newest addition – Hot Design – alongside Hot Reload and Figma design-to-code tooling, allows you to design and build cross-platform .NET apps faster than ever before!

In this demo-packed session, the Uno Platform team will showcase how Rider users uniquely benefit from the productivity boosts brought by a runtime visual designer for cross-platform apps.

You can attend Andres Pineda’s webinar on YouTube, or register here to get a reminder closer to the webinar.

About the presenter:

Andres Pineda

Andres is a Senior Engineer, a Microsoft MVP, a community-driven tech enthusiast, and a core maintainer of the open-source project Uno Platform.

You can follow Andres on Twitter and LinkedIn.
